images.title: City of Skyscrapers
images.description: Famous for the Statue of Liberty, Central Park, Times Square, and the global financial center on Wall Street.

images.title: The City of Lights
images.description: Known for the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, Notre-Dame Cathedral, and as a global center of art, fashion, and cuisine.

images.title: The Capital of Empires
images.description: Home to iconic sites like Big Ben, Buckingham Palace, Tower of London, and the historic British Museum.

images.title: The City of the Rising Sun
images.description: Famous for its blend of traditional and futuristic, including Tokyo Tower, Shibuya Crossing, and beautiful cherry blossoms in the spring.

images.title: The Eternal City
images.description: Known for the Colosseum, the Vatican, Trevi Fountain, and ancient ruins, Rome is a historical and cultural powerhouse.

images.title: The City of Gold
images.description: Recognized for its modern architecture, luxury shopping, and attractions like the Burj Khalifa and the Palm Jumeirah.

images.title: The Harbour City
images.description: Famous for the Sydney Opera House, Sydney Harbour Bridge, and beautiful beaches like Bondi.

images.title: The Crossroads of East and West
images.description: Known for its rich history and landmarks like Hagia Sophia, the Blue Mosque, and the Grand Bazaar.

images.title: The Entertainment Capital
images.description: Renowned for Hollywood, the Walk of Fame, and iconic beaches like Venice Beach and Santa Monica Pier.

images.title: City of Angels
images.description: Known for vibrant street life, temples like Wat Arun and Wat Phra Kaew, and floating markets.

images.title: Marvelous City
images.description: Famed for its Carnival festival, Christ the Redeemer statue, Sugarloaf Mountain, and Copacabana Beach.

images.title: City of a Thousand Minarets
images.description: Home to the Pyramids of Giza, the Sphinx, and the extensive history of ancient Egyptian civilization.

images.title: The Heart of Russia
images.description: Known for Red Square, the Kremlin, St. Basil's Cathedral, and a rich cultural history.
